snippet.title: PopSlinger - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
PopSlinger is a vibrant, narrative-focused musical shooter inspired by 90's Japanese animation, Pop art and New Retro iconography from City Pop and Future Funk album covers.✨📼 📺

Join a Ria, magical girl with soda-powered guns on a dreamy quest to defend her home from sinister invaders from another dimension in a New Retro aesthetic-inspired musical beat ‘em up packed with shooting action! Coming to Nintendo Switch on January 26, 2022!✨📼 📺

Soundtrack produced by Skule Toyama!

Learn more about PopSlinger! - https://bit.ly/3EerwBM

📡Follow us!
Twitter
https://bit.ly/3G6N57U
Instagram
https://bit.ly/3rsJCwf


#NintendoSwitch #NewRetro #PopSlinger #FNK #futurefunk
